Praise Kaia!

When she held her hand up, the fire of life engulfed this lifeless snowfield. A river of molten flame erupted.

We amani built the Divine Furnace to celebrate her grace and turn that river into the swords and armor of freedom.

Praise Kaia for turning despair into hope.

Hope is the foundation of Kaiator, and this cornerstone is a symbol of that hope.

Long live the Divine Furnace!

For the glory of Kaia!
